001package com.technototes.library.control;
002
003/** A class for dpads
004 * @author Alex Stedman
005 * @param <T> The gamepad button class
006 */
007public class GamepadDpad<T extends ButtonBase> implements Stick {
008
009    private boolean enabled = true;
010    /** The objects for the dpad buttons
011     *
012     */
013    public T up, down, left, right;
014
015    /** Create dpad with 4 buttons
016     *
017     * @param u Up button
018     * @param d Down button
019     * @param l Left button
020     * @param r Right button
021     */
022    public GamepadDpad(T u, T d, T l, T r) {
023        up = u;
024        down = d;
025        left = l;
026        right = r;
027    }
028
029    /** Return x axis double (treating dpad as stick)
030     *
031     * @return The double
032     */
033    @Override
034    public double getXAxis() {
035        return (
036            right.getAsBoolean() ? (left.getAsBoolean() ? 0 : 1) : (left.getAsBoolean() ? -1 : 0)
037        );
038    }
039
040    /** Return y axis double (treating dpad as stick)
041     *
042     * @return The double
043     */
044    @Override
045    public double getYAxis() {
046        return (up.getAsBoolean() ? (down.getAsBoolean() ? 0 : 1) : (down.getAsBoolean() ? -1 : 0));
047    }
048
049    @Override
050    public void periodic() {
051        if (isDisabled()) return;
052        up.periodic();
053        down.periodic();
054        left.periodic();
055        right.periodic();
056    }
057
058    @Override
059    public GamepadDpad<T> setEnabled(boolean enable) {
060        enabled = enable;
061        up.setEnabled(enabled);
062        down.setEnabled(enabled);
063        left.setEnabled(enabled);
064        right.setEnabled(enabled);
065        return this;
066    }
067
068    @Override
069    public boolean isEnabled() {
070        return enabled;
071    }
072}
